Html:
Hello,

I really like being able to get MVVM Light updates via NuGet.

When I install MVVM Light in to an existing project, is there a way to NOT have ViewModel.cs and ViewModelLocator.cs added to the project?

Thanks.

Hey ccbVT,
Try installing the “mvvmlightlibs” package instead:
http://nuget.org/packages/mvvmlightlibs
That’s just the libraries and none of the project infrastructure. I use it exclusively.
Hope this helps!
Matt
From: [email removed]
Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2012 3:03 AM
To: [email removed]
Subject: Installing MVVM Light via NuGet [mvvmlight:354957]

I really like being able to get MVVM Light updates via NuGet.

@mabster -- Thanks!  I'll look for that in the future.
